name: 2 Bows 1 Arrow
summary: 2 Bows 1 Arrow is —Åoop action platforming puzzle FOR 2 PLAYERS ONLY! Challenge yourself and your friend with numerous levels that need coordination, problem solving and bow shooting skills. It is more challenging when you have only 1 arrow for both of you.

name: 2-bit Cowboy
summary:
2-bit Cowboy is a Western action platformer game, styled after classics of the Gameboy era.

There's a new sheriff in this 2-bit town: you! And you've got a lot of work to do. Tackle challenges, earn rewards, track down bad guys, and find hidden loot. Play as a cowboy or cowgirl, then customize your look with hats, bandanas, masks, and more. Explore huge levels. Gamble at casinos and drink at saloons. Ride a horse, tame a wild bull, and traverse underground mines in a minecart. Become a legend of the old West.

name: 2BBee
summary: Exciting adventures await you in the world of the most hardworking little creatures! You will have to survive in the world of bees, develop your hive and raise new generations for your life with the dangers that may await you on your way! Survival sandbox, but how long can you survive?

name: 2 Bit Operative
summary: As a government operative tasked with handling the most dangerous tasks, you must Shoot, Spy, Sneak, Sear and Sabotage your way to success. Each mission has unique objectives. Can you complete them all?

name: 2-Bit Explorer
summary: 2-Bit Explorer is a game where exploration is king. A Lovecraftian Zelda-like. Explore the labyrinth that apparently has 1 more bit than you do and find you way out of the strange reality you find yourself in. Find the one you seek...
